mapper.sql: ATI_BASE_FORM_ID, FORM_SENDER, FORM_THEME, FORM_CONTENT, PROC_DEF_ID, PROC_INST_ID, URGENT, LEVEL
mapper.insert:
select ati_base_form_id_seq.nextval from dual
insert into ATI_BASE_FORM
ATI_BASE_FORM_ID,
FORM_SENDER,
FORM_THEME,
FORM_CONTENT,
PROC_DEF_ID,
PROC_INST_ID,
URGENT,
LEVEL,

mapper.update:
update ATI_BASE_FORM
FORM_SENDER = #{formSender,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FORM_THEME = #{formTheme,jdbcType=OTHER},
FORM_CONTENT = #{formContent,jdbcType=OTHER},
PROC_DEF_ID = #{procDefId,jdbcType=OTHER},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URGENT = #{urgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ATI_BASE_FORM_ID = #{atiBaseFormId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ATI_BASE_FORM set FORM_SENDER = #{formSender,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FORM_THEME = #{formTheme,jdbcType=OTHER}, FORM_CONTENT = #{formContent,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROC_DEF_ID = #{procDefId,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URGENT = #{urgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ATI_BASE_FORM_ID = #{atiBaseFormId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
